Skyway.name: Skyway
Skyway.description:
Please check on the {{#crossLink "Skyway/init:method"}}init(){{/crossLink}} function
on how you can initialize Skyway.

classitems.description: Version of Skyway
classitems.name: VERSION

classitems.description:
List of regional server for Skyway to connect to.
Default server is US1. Servers:
classitems.name: REGIONAL_SERVER

params.name: US1
params.description: USA server 1. Default server if region is not provided.

classitems.description: ICE Connection States. States that would occur are:
classitems.name: ICE_CONNECTION_STATE

params.name: CLOSED
params.description: ICE Connection to Peer has been closed

params.name: FAILED
params.description: ICE Connection to Peer has failed

params.name: CHECKING
params.description: ICE Connection to Peer is still in checking status

params.name: DISCONNECTED
params.description: ICE Connection to Peer has been disconnected

params.name: CONNECTED
params.description: ICE Connection to Peer has been connected

params.name: COMPLETED
params.description: ICE Connection to Peer has been completed

classitems.description: Peer Connection States. States that would occur are:
classitems.name: PEER_CONNECTION_STATE

params.name: STABLE
params.description: Initial stage. No local or remote description is applied

params.name: ESTABLISHED
params.description: All description is set and is applied

classitems.description: ICE Candidate Generation States. States that would occur are:
classitems.name: CANDIDATE_GENERATION_STATE

params.name: GATHERING
params.description: ICE Gathering to Peer has just started

params.name: DONE
params.description: ICE Gathering to Peer has been completed

classitems.description: Handshake Progress Steps. Steps that would occur are:
classitems.name: HANDSHAKE_PROGRESS

classitems.description: Data Channel Connection States. Steps that would occur are:
classitems.name: DATA_CHANNEL_STATE

params.name: LOADED
params.description: Step 2. DataChannel events has been loaded.

classitems.description: System actions received from Signaling server. System action outcomes are:
classitems.name: SYSTEM_ACTION

params.name: WARNING
params.description: System is warning user that the room is closing

params.name: REJECT
params.description: System has rejected user from room

classitems.description: State to check if Skyway initialization is ready. Steps that would occur are:
classitems.name: DATA_CHANNEL_STATE

params.name: INIT
params.description: Step 1. Init state. If ReadyState fails, it goes to 0.

params.name: LOADING
params.description:
Step 2. RTCPeerConnection exists. Roomserver,
  API ID provided is not empty

params.name: COMPLETED
params.description:
Step 3. Retrieval of configuration is complete.
  Socket.io begins connection.

params.name: ERROR
params.description: Error state. Occurs when ReadyState fails loading.

classitems.description: Data Channel Transfer Type. Types are:
classitems.name: DATA_TRANSFER_TYPE

classitems.description: Data Channel Transfer State. State that would occur are:
classitems.name: DATA_TRANSFER_STATE

params.name: UPLOAD_STARTED
params.description: Data Transfer of Upload has just started

params.name: DOWNLOAD_STARTED
params.description: Data Transfer od Download has just started

params.name: REJECTED
params.description: Peer rejected User's Data Transfer request

params.name: ERROR
params.description: Error occurred when uploading or downloading file

params.name: UPLOAD_COMPLETED
params.description: Data Transfer of Upload has completed

params.name: DOWNLOAD_COMPLETED
params.description: Data Transfer of Download has completed

classitems.description:
TODO : ArrayBuffer and Blob in DataChannel
Data Channel Transfer Data type. Data Types are:
classitems.name: DATA_TRANSFER_DATA_TYPE

classitems.description:
Signaling message type. These message types are fixed.
(Legend: S - Send only. R - Received only. SR - Can be Both).
Signaling types are:
classitems.name: SIG_TYPE

params.name: IN_ROOM
params.description: R. User has already joined the Room

params.name: PUBLIC_MESSAGE
params.description: SR. Sending a public broadcast message.

classitems.description: Lock Action States
classitems.name: LOCK_ACTION

params.name: STATUS
params.description: Get the status of the room if it's locked or not

classitems.description: Video Resolutions. Resolution types are:

params.name: FHD
params.description: Might not be supported. FullHD video quality.

classitems.name: VIDEO_RESOLUTION

classitems.description: NOTE ALEX: check if last char is '/'
classitems.name: _path

classitems.description: Url Skyway makes API calls to
classitems.name: _serverPath

classitems.description: The server region the room connects to
classitems.name: _serverRegion

classitems.description: The Room server User connects to
classitems.name: _roomServer

classitems.description: The Application Key ID
classitems.name: _apiKey

classitems.description: The default room that the User connects to
classitems.name: _defaultRoom

classitems.description: The room that the User connects to
classitems.name: _selectedRoom

classitems.description: The room start datetime in ISO format
classitems.name: _roomStart

classitems.description: The room duration before closing
classitems.name: _roomDuration

classitems.description: The room credentials to set the start time and duration
classitems.name: _roomCredentials

classitems.description: The Server Key
classitems.name: _key

classitems.description: The actual socket that handle the connection
classitems.name: _socket

classitems.description: The socket version of the socket.io used
classitems.name: _socketVersion

classitems.description: User Information, credential and the local stream(s).
classitems.name: _user

props.name: audioMuted
props.description: If Peer's Audio stream is muted.

props.name: videoMuted
props.description: If Peer's Video stream is muted.

props.name: pcHelper
props.description:
Holder for all the constraints objects used
  in a peerconnection lifetime. Some are initialized by default, some are initialized by
  internal methods, all can be overriden through updateUser. Future APIs will help user
modifying specific parts (audio only, video only, ...) separately without knowing the
intricacies of constraints.

props.name: pcConfig
props.description: Will be provided upon connection to a room

classitems.description: Internal array of peerconnections
classitems.name: _peerConnections

classitems.description: Internal array of peer informations
classitems.name: _peerInformations

classitems.description: Internal array of dataChannels
classitems.name: _dataChannels

classitems.description: Internal array of dataChannel peers
classitems.name: _dataChannelPeers

classitems.description:
The current ReadyState
-1 'failed', 0 'false', 1 'in process', 2 'done'
classitems.name: _readyState

classitems.description: State if Channel is opened or not
classitems.name: _channel_open

classitems.description: State if User is in room or not
classitems.name: _in_room

classitems.description: Stores the upload data chunks
classitems.name: _uploadDataTransfers

classitems.description: Stores the upload data session information
classitems.name: _uploadDataSessions

classitems.description: Stores the download data chunks
classitems.name: _downloadDataTransfers

classitems.description: Stores the download data session information
classitems.name: _downloadDataSessions

classitems.description: Stores the data transfers timeout
classitems.name: _dataTransfersTimeout

classitems.description: Standard File Size of each chunk
classitems.name: _chunkFileSize

classitems.description: Standard File Size of each chunk for Firefox
classitems.name: _mozChunkFileSize

classitems.description: If ICE trickle should be disabled or not
classitems.name: _enableIceTrickle

classitems.description: If DataChannel should be disabled or not
classitems.name: _enableDataChannel

classitems.description: User stream settings. By default, all is false.
classitems.name: _streamSettings

classitems.description: Get information from server
classitems.name: _requestServerInfo

params.name: url
params.description: Path url to make request to

params.name: callback
params.description: Callback function after request is laoded

classitems.description: Parse information from server
classitems.name: _parseInfo

classitems.description: Load information from server
classitems.name: _loadInfo

classitems.description: Let app register a callback function to an event
classitems.name: on

classitems.description: Let app unregister a callback function from an event
classitems.name: off
example: SkywayDemo.off('peerJoined', callback);

classitems.description:
Trigger all the callbacks associated with an event
Note that extra arguments can be passed to the callback
which extra argument can be expected by callback is documented by each event
classitems.name: _trigger

classitems.description:
IMPORTANT: Please call this method to load all server information before joining
the room or doing anything else.
This is Init function to load Skyway.
classitems.name: init

params.name: options
params.description: Connection options or API Key ID

props.name: apiKey
props.description: API Key ID to identify with the Temasys backend server

props.name: defaultRoom
props.description:
Optional. The default room to connect to if there is
  no room provided in {{#crossLink "Skyway/joinRoom:method"}}joinRoom(){{/crossLink}}.

props.name: roomServer
props.description:
Optional. Path to the Temasys backend server
  If there's no room provided, default room would be used.

props.name: region
props.description:
Optional. The regional server that user chooses to use.
  [Rel: Skyway.REGIONAL_SERVER]

props.name: iceTrickle
props.description:
Optional. The option to enable iceTrickle or not.
  Default is true.

props.name: dataChannel
props.description:
Optional. The option to enable dataChannel or not.
  Default is true.

props.name: startDateTime
props.description:
The Start timing of the
  meeting in Date ISO String

props.name: credentials
props.description:
The credentials required
  to set the timing and duration of a meeting.

classitems.description: Reinitialize Skyway signaling credentials
classitems.name: _reinit

classitems.description:
Set and Update the User information. Please note that the custom
data would be overrided so please call getUser and then modify the
information you want individually.
classitems.name: setUserData

classitems.description: Get the User Information
classitems.name: getUserData
example: var userInfo = SkywayDemo.getUserData();

classitems.description: Get the Peer Information
classitems.name: getPeerInfo
example: var peerInfo = SkywayDemo.getPeerInfo(peerId);

classitems.description:
Event fired when a successfull connection channel has been established
with the signaling server
classitems.name: channelOpen

classitems.description: Event fired when the channel has been closed.
classitems.name: channelClose

classitems.description: Event fired when we received a message from the sig server..
classitems.name: channelMessage

classitems.description: Event fired when there was an error with the connection channel to the sig server.
classitems.name: channelError

classitems.description: Event fired whether the room is ready for use
classitems.name: readyStateChange

params.name: error
params.description: Error message when there's an error

classitems.description:
Event fired when a step of the handshake has happened. Usefull for diagnostic
or progress bar.
classitems.name: handshakeProgress

classitems.description: Event fired during ICE gathering
classitems.name: candidateGenerationState

classitems.description: Event fired during Peer Connection state change
classitems.name: peerConnectionState

classitems.description: Event fired during ICE connection
Event fired when allowing webcam media stream fails
classitems.name: mediaAccessError

classitems.description: Event fired when allowing webcam media stream passes
classitems.name: mediaAccessSuccess

classitems.description: Event fired when a chat message is received from other peers
classitems.name: chatMessageReceived

classitems.description:
Event fired when a peer joins the room. Inactive audio or video means that the
audio is muted or video is muted.
classitems.name: peerJoined

props.name: audioMuted
props.description: If Peer's Audio stream is muted.

props.name: videoMuted
props.description: If Peer's Video stream is muted.

classitems.description:
Event fired when a peer information is updated. Inactive audio or video means that the
audio is muted or video is muted.
classitems.name: peerUpdated

props.name: audioMuted
props.description: If Peer's Audio stream is muted.

props.name: videoMuted
props.description: If Peer's Video stream is muted.

classitems.description: Event fired when a peer leaves the room
classitems.name: peerLeft

classitems.description: TODO Event fired when a peer joins the room
classitems.name: presenceChanged

classitems.description: Event fired when a remote stream has become available
classitems.name: addPeerStream

classitems.description: TODO Event fired when a remote stream has become unavailable
classitems.name: removePeerStream

classitems.description: Event fired when a room is locked
classitems.name: roomLock

classitems.description: Event fired when a DataChannel's state has changed
classitems.name: dataChannelState

classitems.description: Event fired when a Peer there is a Data Transfer going on
classitems.name: dataTransferState

params.name: transferInfo
params.description: Available data may vary at different state.

props.name: percentage
props.description:
The percetange of data being
  uploaded / downloaded

props.name: type
props.description:
Where the error message occurred.
  [Rel: Skyway.DATA_TRANSFER_TYPE]

classitems.description:
Event fired when the Signalling server responds to user regarding
the state of the room
classitems.name: systemAction

classitems.description: Event fired when a private message is broadcasted.
classitems.name: privateMessage

params.name: data
params.description:
Data to be sent over. Data is based on
  what the user has set.

params.name: peerId
params.description: Targeted Peer to receive the data

params.name: isSelf
params.description: Check if message is sent to self

classitems.description: Event fired when a public message is broadcasted.
classitems.name: publicMessage

params.name: data
params.description:
Data to be sent over. Data is based on
  what the user has set.

params.name: isSelf
params.description: Check if message is sent to self

classitems.description: Send a chat message
classitems.name: sendChatMessage

params.name: targetPeerId
params.description:
Optional. Specified when peer wants to
  send a private chat message to the targeted peer.

classitems.description: Send a chat message via DataChannel
classitems.name: sendDataChannelChatMessage

params.name: targetPeerId
params.description:
Optional. Specified when peer wants to
  send a private chat message to the targeted peer.

classitems.description: Broadcasts a private message
classitems.name: sendPrivateMessage

classitems.description: Broadcasts a public broadcast message
classitems.name: sendPublicMessage

classitems.description: Get the default cam and microphone
classitems.name: getUserMedia

props.name: resolution
props.description: Check out the types of [Rel: Skyway.VIDEO_RESOLUTION]

classitems.description: Stream is available, let's throw the corresponding event with the stream attached.
classitems.name: _onUserMediaSuccess

params.name: self
params.description: A convenience pointer to the Skyway object for callbacks

classitems.description: getUserMedia could not succeed.
classitems.name: _onUserMediaError

params.name: self
params.description: A convenience pointer to the Skyway object for callbacks

classitems.name: _processSigMessage

classitems.description: This dispatch all the messages from the infrastructure to their respective handler
classitems.name: _processingSingleMessage

classitems.description: Throw an event with the received chat message
classitems.name: _chatHandler

classitems.description: Signaling server error message
classitems.name: _errorHandler

classitems.description: Signaling server wants us to move out.
classitems.name: _redirectHandler

classitems.description: User Information is updated
classitems.name: _updateUserEventHandler

classitems.description: Room Lock is Fired
classitems.name: _roomLockEventHandler

props.name: lock
props.description: If room is locked or not

classitems.description: Peer Audio is muted/unmuted
classitems.name: _muteAudioEventHandler

props.name: muted
props.description: If audio stream is muted or not

classitems.description: Peer Video is muted/unmuted
classitems.name: _muteVideoEventHandler

props.name: muted
props.description: If video stream is muted or not

classitems.description: A peer left, let's clean the corresponding connection, and trigger an event.
classitems.name: _byeHandler

classitems.description: Throw an event with the received private message
classitems.name: _privateMessageHandler

classitems.description: Throw an event with the received private message
classitems.name: _publicMessageHandler

classitems.description:
Actually clean the peerconnection and trigger an event. Can be called by _byHandler
and leaveRoom.
classitems.name: _removePeer

params.name: peerId
params.description: Id of the peer to remove

classitems.description: We just joined a room! Let's send a nice message to all to let them know I'm in.
classitems.name: _inRoomHandler

classitems.description:
Someone just entered the room. If we don't have a connection with him/her,
send him a welcome. Handshake step 2 and 3.
classitems.name: _enterHandler

props.name: mediaStatus.audioMuted
props.description: If Peer's Audio stream is muted.

props.name: mediaStatus.videoMuted
props.description: If Peer's Video stream is muted.

classitems.description:
We have just received a welcome. If there is no existing connection with this peer,
create one, then set the remotedescription and answer.
classitems.name: _welcomeHandler

props.name: enableIceTrickle
props.description: Option to enable Ice trickle or not

props.name: enableDataChannel
props.description: Option to enable DataChannel or not

props.name: mediaStatus.audioMuted
props.description: If Peer's Audio stream is muted.

props.name: mediaStatus.videoMuted
props.description: If Peer's Video stream is muted.

classitems.description:
We have just received an offer. If there is no existing connection with this peer,
create one, then set the remotedescription and answer.
classitems.name: _offerHandler

classitems.description:
We have succesfully received an offer and set it locally. This function will take care
of cerating and sendng the corresponding answer. Handshake step 4.
classitems.name: _doAnswer

params.name: targetMid
params.description: The peer we should connect to.

classitems.description:
We have a peer, this creates a peerconnection object to handle the call.
if we are the initiator, we then starts the O/A handshake.
classitems.name: _openPeer

params.name: targetMid
params.description: The peer we should connect to.

params.name: toOffer
params.description: Wether we should start the O/A or wait.

classitems.description:
Sends our Local MediaStream to other Peers.
By default, it sends all it's other stream
classitems.name: _addLocalStream

classitems.description:
The remote peer advertised streams, that we are forwarding to the app. This is part
of the peerConnection's addRemoteDescription() API's callback.
classitems.name: _onRemoteStreamAdded

params.name: event
params.description: This is provided directly by the peerconnection API.

classitems.description: It then sends it to the peer. Handshake step 3 (offer) or 4 (answer)
classitems.name: _doCall

classitems.description: Find a line in the SDP and return it
classitems.name: _findSDPLine

return.description: [index, line] - Returns the sdpLines based on the condition

classitems.description: Add Stereo to SDP. Requires OPUS
classitems.name: _addStereo

classitems.description: Set Audio, Video and Data Bitrate in SDP
classitems.name: _setSDPBitrate

return.description: Updated version with custom Bandwidth settings

classitems.description:
This takes an offer or an aswer generated locally and set it in the peerconnection
it then sends it to the peer. Handshake step 3 (offer) or 4 (answer)
classitems.name: _setLocalAndSendMessage

params.name: sessionDescription
params.description:
This should be provided by the peerconnection API.
  User might 'tamper' with it, but then , the setLocal may fail.

classitems.description: This sets the STUN server specially for Firefox for ICE Connection
classitems.name: _setFirefoxIceServers

classitems.description:
Waits for MediaStream. Once the stream is loaded, callback is called
If there's not a need for stream, callback is called
classitems.name: _waitForMediaStream

params.name: callback
params.description: Callback after requested constraints are loaded.

classitems.description: Close/Open existing mediaStreams
classitems.name: _setStreams

return.description: Whether we should re-fetch mediaStreams or not

classitems.description:
Create a peerconnection to communicate with the peer whose ID is 'targetMid'.
All the peerconnection callbacks are set up here. This is a quite central piece.
classitems.name: _createPeerConnection

classitems.description:
A candidate has just been generated (ICE gathering) and will be sent to the peer.
Part of connection establishment.
classitems.name: _onIceCandidate

params.name: event
params.description: This is provided directly by the peerconnection API.

classitems.description: Handling reception of a candidate. handshake done, connection ongoing.
classitems.name: _candidateHandler

classitems.description: Handling reception of an answer (to a previous offer). handshake step 4.
classitems.name: _answerHandler

classitems.description: Send a message to the signaling server
classitems.name: _sendMessage

classitems.description: Initiate a Socket signaling connection.
classitems.name: _openChannel

classitems.description: Close the Socket signaling connection.
classitems.name: _closeChannel

classitems.description: Create a DataChannel. Only SCTPDataChannel support
classitems.name: _createDataChannel

params.name: peerId
params.description: The peerId of which the dataChannel is connected to

params.name: callback
params.description: The callback which it returns the DataChannel object to

classitems.description: Check DataChannel ReadyState. If ready, it sends a 'CONN'
classitems.name: _checkDataChannelStatus

classitems.description: Sending of String Data over the DataChannels
classitems.name: _sendDataChannel

classitems.description: To obtain the Peer that it's connected to from the DataChannel
classitems.name: _dataChannelPeer

classitems.description: To obtain the Peer that it's connected to from the DataChannel
classitems.name: _closeDataChannel

classitems.description: The Handler for all DataChannel Protocol events
classitems.name: _dataChannelHandler

classitems.description:
DataChannel TFTP Protocol Stage: WRQ
The sender has sent a request to send file
From here, it's up to the user to accept or reject it
classitems.name: _dataChannelWRQHandler

classitems.description:
DataChannel TFTP Protocol Stage: ACK
The user sends a ACK of the request [accept/reject/nhe current
index of chunk to be sent over]
classitems.name: _dataChannelACKHandler

classitems.description:
DataChannel TFTP Protocol Stage: CHAT
The user receives a DataChannel CHAT message
classitems.name: _dataChannelCHATHandler

classitems.description:
DataChannel TFTP Protocol Stage: ERROR
The user received an error, usually an exceeded timeout.
classitems.name: _dataChannelERRORHandler

classitems.description:
DataChannel TFTP Protocol Stage: DATA
This is when the data is sent from the sender to the receiving user
classitems.name: _dataChannelDATAHandler

classitems.description: Set the DataChannel timeout. If exceeded, send the 'ERROR' message
classitems.name: _setDataChannelTimeout

classitems.description: Clear the DataChannel timeout as a response is received
classitems.name: _clearDataChannelTimeout

classitems.description:
Convert base64 to raw binary data held in a string.
Doesn't handle URLEncoded DataURIs
- see StackOverflow answer #6850276 for code that does this
This is to convert the base64 binary string to a blob
classitems.author: Code from devnull69 @ stackoverflow.com
classitems.name: _base64ToBlob

classitems.description:
To chunk the File (which already is a blob) into smaller blob files.
For now please send files below or around 2KB till chunking is implemented
classitems.name: _chunkFile

classitems.description: Removes non-alphanumeric characters from a string and return it.
classitems.name: _stripNonAlphanumeric

classitems.description:
Check if a text string consist of only alphanumeric characters.
If so, return true.
If not, return false.
classitems.name: _alphanumeric

return.description: If string contains only alphanumeric characters.

classitems.description:
Method to send Blob data to peers.
Peers have the option to download or reject the file.
classitems.name: sendBlobData

params.name: data
params.description: - The Blob data to be sent over

props.name: timeout
props.description: The timeout to wait for packets

props.name: size
props.description: The Blob data size. Default is 60.

params.name: targetPeerId
params.description:
The specific peerId to send to.
  Leave blank to send to all peers.

classitems.description:
Method to send Blob data to individual peer.
This sends the 'WRQ' and initiate the TFTP protocol.
classitems.name: _sendBlobDataToPeer

params.name: data
params.description: - The Blob data to be sent over

props.name: timeout
props.description:
The timeout to wait for packets.
  Default is 60.

classitems.description: Handle the Lock actions
classitems.name: _handleLock

classitems.description:
Restart the {{#crossLink "Skyway/joinRoom:method"}}joinRoom(){{/crossLink}}
process to initiate Audio and Video
classitems.name: _handleAV

classitems.description: Lock the Room to prevent users from coming in
classitems.name: lockRoom
example: SkywayDemo.lockRoom();

classitems.description: Unlock the Room to allow users to come in
classitems.name: unlockRoom
example: SkywayDemo.unlockRoom();

classitems.description:
Enable Microphone. If Microphone is not enabled from the
beginning, user would have to reinitate the
{{#crossLink "Skyway/joinRoom:method"}}joinRoom(){{/crossLink}}
process and ask for Microphone again.
classitems.name: enableAudio
example: SkywayDemo.enableAudio();

classitems.description:
Disable Microphone. If Microphone is not enabled from the
beginning, there is no effect.
classitems.name: disableAudio
example: SkywayDemo.disableAudio();

classitems.description:
Enable Webcam Video. If Webcam Video is not enabled from the
beginning, user would have to reinitate the
{{#crossLink "Skyway/joinRoom:method"}}joinRoom(){{/crossLink}}
process and ask for Webcam video again.
classitems.name: enableVideo
example: SkywayDemo.enableVideo();

classitems.description:
Disable Webcam Video. If Webcam Video is not enabled from the
beginning, there is no effect.
classitems.name: disableVideo
example: SkywayDemo.disableVideo();

classitems.description: Parse Stream settings
classitems.name: _parseStreamSettings
joinRoom

classitems.description: User to leave the room
classitems.name: leaveRoom
example: SkywayDemo.leaveRoom();

warnings.message:
Missing item type
Event fired during ICE connection
